name: com.unity.game.foundation
description:
Game Foundation core package.

This package contains the following components: 
▪ Inventory System 
▪ Virtual Currency Wallet 
▪ Stats System
▪ Core Systems 

Note: Preview release, public API subject to change.

samples.description: This sample contains a database which should be used in all other samples. It also contains a class with helper methods for the samples.
This sample showcases the basics of how to work with a single inventory.
This sample showcases how to work with multiple inventories using the inventory manager.
This sample showcases how to work with categories.
This sample showcases how to work with the wallet and currencies.
This sample showcases how to work with the stats system.
This sample showcases how to use data persistence to save and load your data.
